Name: Life On A Pizza
About the game: PLAY COUCH MULTIPLAYER OR SOLO Perfect game for parties (up to 4 players) and a perfect game to play alone. The fun does not get affected! EASY TO PLAY, HARD TO MASTER The simplest controls. Left, right, up, and down. A great example of the classic “Easy to play, hard to master.” saying. Also, very easily playable with a keyboard or controller. PVP OR COOP Survive with or against your friends or other players! Each is a completely different experience. CUSTOMIZE YOUR PIZZA Different colors and shapes to choose from gives you the option to play on some bizarre looking pizzas! DIFFERENT GAME MODES Got bored? Switch to a different game mode. Problem solved. POWERUPS TO SPICE IT ALL UP Think of them as extra cheese. No extra charge. UPDATES = MORE CONTENT More toppings to play with, more game modes, more customization options, more powerups, more fun. Goes without saying that updates will bring more chaotic exciting content. LOOKING TO PLAY WITH SOMEONE? Join the community server, send a message in the designated channel, boom.
